benchmark_details.name: srsRANBench
benchmark_details.overview: srsRANBench is a novel benchmark designed for code generation and codebase understanding specifically for the srsRAN project, enabling the evaluation of various LLMs in 5G O-RAN-specific coding tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for evaluating code generation and understanding capabilities of LLMs applied to O-RAN tasks.

data.source: Curated dataset from the srsRAN project source files and O-RAN specifications.
data.annotation: Automatically generated through a Retrieval-Augmented Generation framework

methodology.calculation: Evaluative metrics derived from performance comparisons against existing models.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores reflect better performance in generating accurate code and understanding O-RAN specifications.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through empirical performance assessments against state-of-the-art telecom LLMs.
